/usr/local/cuda/bin/nvcc -forward-unknown-to-host-compiler -g -Xcompiler=-fPIC -Wno-deprecated-gpu-targets -shared -dlink CMakeFiles/test_cuda_opencl.dir/main.cu.o -o CMakeFiles/test_cuda_opencl.dir/cmake_device_link.o   -L/usr/local/cuda/lib64/libOpenCL.so   -lcudadevrt -lcudart_static -lrt -lpthread -ldl
